alert.note: Alert for East Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:14AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Carteret County through 645 AM EDT... At 614 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stacy, or 12 miles northeast of Harkers Island, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sealevel, Marshallberg, Smyrna, Atlantic, Davis, Williston, Open Grounds Farm and Stacy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
